transcript:
Customer: Hello?
Executive: Hello. Hello, ji madam.
Customer: Ji sir, maine kal lagaya tha wo call unhone uthaya nahi mera number.
Executive: Ji ji. Jane dijiye madam ho sakta hai unhone na lena ho unko. Halaki mere pass wo ye jiska wo demand kiye the usme online the 100 ton ka demand tha inka aur mere pass maal bhi tha aur ye bhi inka thik thak tha isiliye humne jo hai call kiya to halaki.
Customer: Thik hai koi nahi.
Executive: To ek kam kijiye sir ye aapne night shift me call kiya tha. To ye concern raise ho gaya tha sir mai isko close kar deti hu, thik hai?
Customer: Ji sir, usme hamara target bhi kam ho jayega na madam?
Executive: Kya ho jayega?
Customer: Jaise koi deal nahi hui to isme ye utne milte hai mujhe hafte ke 10 party.
Executive: Hmm.
Customer: To usme matlab add ho jayenge deal wo minus ho jayenge jinko se hamara dealing nahi hua.
Executive: Nahi deal hone na hone se koi matlab nahi hota aapne call consume ki hai to aapka ek balance reduce hoga.
Customer: Hmm.
Executive: Madam aapka phone uthaya hai ki nahi wo bataiye.
Customer: Nahi uthaya na.
Executive: Nahi uthaya.
Executive: Ji. Aap ek kam kijiye, samjho maine aapko number diya na whatsapp pe agar next time kabhi kuch puchna ho to waha pe mujhe message kar dena whatsapp pe to mai aapko call kar lungi.
Customer: Thik hai.
Executive: Jaise maine aapko calling ke liye number diya aap usse call kar lena. Kyunki kya hai na ki account manager ka jo number hota hai directly usse bhi call karna hota hai. Agar aap waha bhi karoge to bhi wo call divert hoke hamare pass hi aati hai to matlab hame hi connect karna hota hai like that. Kyunki aapko wahi verification haan matlab aapka kuch waisa nahi tha na ki matlab aapko kuch problem ho ya aisa kuch to nahi tha na?
Customer: Nahi nahi aisa nahi hai.
Executive: Ji, waise aapki koi deal vagera convert hui hai abhi tak?
Customer: Abhi tak madam kuch nahi hua hai abhi gaadi mil gaya bas.
Executive: Achha achha local vagera me?
Customer: Madam local hi tha jo tha ye Gorakhpur tha Ayodhya se Gorakhpur distance 150 kilometer ka hai.
Executive: Hmm.
Customer: Aur jaha se maal jata hai maal.
Executive: Kitna meter?
Customer: 150 kilometer. 150 kilometer inka requirement 100 ton ka tha inke.
Executive: Achha achha. Ji. To iske alawa aur bhi to lead chali hogi.
Customer: Madam lead bahut dur Andhra Pradesh, Maharashtra bahut dur aati hai jaise 200, 400, 600 kilometer, 800 kilometer aur Bihar kuch lead nahi deti hai hame.
Executive: Kuch direct calls aate hai aur jo inquiry hai aati hai unko call karte ho?
Customer: Madam ye jab se hum jude hai aapki company se kya ek bar call aaya hai Anpara se.
Executive: Ji. Nahi nahi aapko call aaya hai wo bhi jo hai.
Customer: Ji.
Executive: Call aapko ek second dekh ke bata deti hu mai aapko. Aapko October me bhi do call aaye the November me bhi do call aaye hai aur aapki baat bhi kafi lambi hui hai 3 minute 21 second tak baat hui hai.
Customer: Madam jo aaj aaya hai aaj ya kal aaya hai ji.
Executive: Hmm. Hmm. Kal aaya tha ye. To jo October me aaye the wo dono miss ho gaye the. To mai jaise call miss bhi ho jata hai to wo aisa miss call me dikhta hai aapko aapke IndiaMART app me. Ji ji. Zara to dekha ho. Haan plus aapko kuch inquiry aati hai message ke form me. Lead manager me. Ji. Unko bhi dekh sakte ho aap. Mail mail id mail id pe aa jata hai mera.
Executive: Achha nahi lead manager open karte ho na jaise usme bhi lead consume aap kar chuke hote ho wo aati hai.
Customer: Mail id pe aa jati hai ji. Haan plus waha inquiry bhi aati hai kuch jaise kisi ne aapko directly agar message dala ho to.
Executive: Madam inquiry mail id pe aati hai?
Executive: Lead manager me dikhti hai wo to mail id pe notification aata hai na sir. Haan haan usi se hum clear notification to by lead inquiry sabka hi aata hai. Dikhegi to wo lead manager me na aapke. Usko open bhi karoge IndiaMART app pe jaoge to.
Customer: Madam connect karwaiye koi lekar ke kam ho.
Executive: Sir dekho connect to aapko karna padega.
Customer: Madam dekh to rahe hai lekin abhi mil nahi raha mujhe mere hisab se abhi milta hai to.
Executive: Mil jayega sir abhi to shuru hua hai aapka.
Customer: Madam unko lagta hai 15 din ho gaye jude hue kitna din ho gaya aapke yaha dekhiye opening kab hua hai hamara.
Executive: November 10 din hue sir.
Customer: Ji.
Customer: 10 din me ek bhi gaadi nahi hui ho gaya.
Executive: 10 din to hota hi hai.
Customer: Madam believe nahi karenge hamare pass Bihar se order aa gaye aa chuke hai abhi kal hi aaya tha Ughadi ka order. Agar aapko maal bhejne me koi dikkat hai to aap ship with IndiaMART bhi use kar sakte ho. Koi dikkat nahi hai bas aapka jo amount hai uska tax vagera lagega baki aapka koi charge nahi lagega. Hum to dene ke liye tayar hai tax uska tension nahi hai. Hamara matlab hai door door se aa raha hai door door ka to bata rahi hu. Koi baat nahi hai dur dur ka aayega dur bhej denge lekin rate un logo ka bahut dusre tarike se hai na. Rate bahut kam hai isiliye hum connect nahi kar rahe. Madam connect karenge to hafte ki 10 partiya aap de rahi hai pata chalega sab balance khatam ho jayega koi matlab nahi reh jayega isiliye nahi connect karte hue abhi kitna do is hafte me do lead kar chuke hai na madam. Haan aap unse baat nahi karoge to deal kaise hogi convert. Nahi nahi wo to thik hai lekin jab dekh rahe hai hamare matlab ka banega tabhi na kar payenge ab jaise Gorakhpur lag raha tha mujhe baat karni chahiye. Madam main aapko yahi keh rahi hu ki agar dur ki bhi lead aati hai to ship with IndiaMART use karke usko bhej sakte ho agar order value achha hai to. Agar order value kam hai 10000 20000 ka hai to mat bhejna lekin agar achha order value hai to bhale hi dur ki bhi lead ho to bhi aap kar sakte ho ki aapko bhejne ke liye yaha pe option hai ship with IndiaMART ka usme aapki gaadi ki booking hogi aapko bas apna tax vagera pay karna hoga jaise 1 lakh ka order hai man lo to jo bhi tax banega wo aap pay karoge baki aapko wo nahi bhejna wo aap apne jisko bech rahe ho na usse pehle hi baat karke rakhna to aap usse bhi le sakte ho agar wo dene ko ready ho jaye to. Ji ji. Ji. Samjhe isliye mai ye close kar rahi hu aapke pass na feedback ke liye ek mail aayega. Thik hai. Haan to aap agar satisfied honge na to waha yes kar dijiyega. Okay madam.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer's call was not picked up.

- Target may decrease if deal not done.

- No deals converted yet.

- Leads from far away.

- Wants help connecting with potential clients.



Resolution:

- Executive closed the concern.

- Executive shared WhatsApp number for assistance.

- Executive explained about account manager number.

- Executive explained about missed calls and inquiries.

- Executive explained about Ship with IndiaMART.



Next Steps: 

- Customer will receive a feedback mail.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, ship with indiamart, account manager, feedback
